title: Episode 69: Kate Payne
description: This week on Let’s Eat In, Cathy talks to the author of the “Hip Girls Guide to Homemaking”, Kate Payne, about quick pickling, mending parties, and more. Kate takes us inside the re-appropriation of homemaking with an emphasis on community and crowdsourcing. Don’t miss out on her ultimate date meal or missing her and Cathy at the Brooklyn Flea this May! This episode was sponsored by Hearst Ranch.
author: info@heritageradionetwork.org (Heritage Radio Network)
